attributes.action: Revise legislation for rough sleepers and the elderly and vulnerable
attributes.additional_details: I done a food drop with my girlfriend from goodge st up to chasing cross rd along the top of that road I met elderly gentleman in his late 50s or early 60s sleeping rough in a doorway rough with just sleeping bag I asked his name he replied Michael politely I asked why he his homeless and has no shelter he said he had lost all his identification including post office card so could no longer get help as he could no longer prove to the corporation who he was and can no longer claim benefits
attributes.background: Introduce new measures in the housing act 2002 that give more support and protection to rough sleepers the elderly and the poor
